[theemo](./theemo.md) &gt; [FigmaReferencerConfig](./theemo.figmareferencerconfig.md)

## FigmaReferencerConfig type

Figma does not support references of tokens, as such this information is coming through another source, which is described here.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type FigmaReferencerConfig = FigmaReferencerPluginConfig & {
    type: FigmaReferencerType;
};
```
<b>References:</b> [FigmaReferencerPluginConfig](./theemo.figmareferencerpluginconfig.md), [FigmaReferencerType](./theemo.figmareferencertype.md)

## Example

Use with the theemo plugin:

```json
referencer: {
  type: 'figma-plugin',
  plugin: 'theemo',
  pluginOptions: {
    jsonbinFile: process.env.JSONBIN_FILE,
    jsonbinSecret: process.env.JSONBIN_SECRET,
    formats: {
      color: 'hex',
      colorAlpha: 'rgb'
    }
  }
}
```
